# backgroundImageContentMode

**Instance Property**

The content mode to use when displaying the bar’s background image.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var backgroundImageContentMode: UIView.ContentMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to specify how to scale or fit the image in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBarAppearance/backgroundImage] property.

## Configuring the background appearance

- **backgroundEffect**: The blur effect to apply to the bar’s background.
- **backgroundColor**: The background color of the bar.
- **backgroundImage**: The image to display on top of the bar’s background color.
